stories.text: Instead of sending all your key personal data to other 3rd party tools, you can send any communication (Email, SMS, Whatsapp chats) using data from your own databases. You can even connect multiple data sources and send personalized segmented communications over them. We will make sure that data comes sequentially and would not affect your database performance. Would you be interested in such a solution?
stories.title: Ask HN: Personalized Communication Engine over your own database

stories.text:
Finally got back to working on Blokfeed and super excited about its latest feature... Daily saved search alerts! After you search for topics you are interested in you can save those search params and get daily email alerts containing articles related to your search!

Signup -> Search -> Save -> Get your daily email alert!

Couldnâ€™t be simpler!

https://blokfeed.com
stories.title: Show HN: Daily Crypto News Alerts

stories.text:
I have an MBA and lots of business experience.

It has always been my dream to have a PhD, and a PhD in Business seems to be the low-hanging fruit.

At the same time I would enjoy the challenges of the process.

Is there a good/reliable/relatively inexpensive program inline (or in person in NYC) where to pursue a PhD in Business?

TIA
stories.title: Ask HN: Online PhD in Business: where? Worth it?
